current.search_info: Read the verse in different versions and one or more verses before and after for context. Hightlight keywords that stand out to you.
current.context_text: Jesus often used examples from nature to explain spiritual truths. He spoke our language and related to our everyday experience. God's name is also 'Palmoni' or 'Wonderful Numberer'.
current.prayer_text: Dear Father in Heaven, I thank you that You pay so close attention to me that every hair on my head is numbered. There is nothing to small in my life for you to notice. You are acquainted with my every detail and care in my heart. For this reason, I choose not to worry because my life is safe in Your hands.
